alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Espanola Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 24 at 2:08AM MDT until July 24 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures between 98 and 102 degrees in the Northwest Plateau, Espanola and Middle Rio Grande Valleys, and between 103 and 107 elsewhere in the advisory. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Northwest Plateau, Espanola Valley, Eastern San Miguel County, Quay County, De Baca County, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Espanola Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau; Quay County
